### [choco://intel-network-drivers-win10](choco://intel-network-drivers-win10)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

## Introduction

Installs the Intel® Network Adapter drivers release xx.x for Windows® 10

## Overview

The Microsoft Windows* download package has been split into a driver package and an Intel® PROSet package.  The driver package must be installed prior to installing the Intel® PROSet package. 
 
**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/intel-network-drivers-win10/readme.md)**
	

---

**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**
